root: ^It’s a quiet night. Bored, you remove the SPI emblem from your jacket and trace the ridges of the design aimlessly.
^Your name is engraved into the back of the emblem.
^When the metal has stolen all the heat from your fingertips, you return it where it belongs on your jacket, hands returning into warm pockets.
^It’s freezing… I should’ve worn a thicker jacket.
^Ah, the sudden drop in temperature explains itself when a man materializes a few steps in front of you.
^Don’t, don’t! I’m not here to harm you!
^You’re a member of SPI! You can help me. Aren’t you guys all about exorcising ghosts that cause problems?
^(Does it recognize the pin on your jacket?)
^Hear me out, I have an offer for you. Don’t kill me and I can help you get rid of a malicious ghost that’ll get you a better reputation in SPI.
^There’s no point in killing me. I’m… weak. I can’t do much harm or physically materialize in the living world anymore.
^Alright. Tell me about this malicious ghost.
^I was attacked by the ghost of a medieval knight while minding my own business — do I look like food?
^I lost him a little way back, but now there’s some murderous knight after me for no reason.

choice1: ^If we get rid of him, it’s a win for both of us. Can you do it?
continue: ^Great. Name’s Archibald, by the way. Cheers, or whatever you humans say.
